com.toxic.core.engine.util.log

Interface LogFactory


  • public interface LogFactory

    Interface provided possibility create Logger instance for specified class. Also provided capabilities of management log level and customize output template.


    Author:
    Strelock

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Logger getLogger(String className)
      Return logger for corresponding className
      void setLogLevel(LogLevel logLevel)
      Setting global logic level, to prevent print less of settled level messages.
      void setPrintTime(boolean flag)
      Determines weather logging process should also contains time of printing message.

        void setPrintTime(boolean flag)

        Determines weather logging process should also contains time of printing message.


        By default : false .
